name: Appalachian Research & Defense Fund of Kentucky
description: AppalReD Legal Aid provides free legal services to low-income and vulnerable individuals in eastern and south-central Kentucky. Services include consumer problems, domestic violence and family law, housing issues, public benefits, utility disputes, education rights, healthcare issues, employment problems, senior citizen services, tax issues, and expungements. No fees charged.
source: Verified from official website and administrative office information
eligibility_requirements: Must be low-income with limited assets. Senior citizens eligible regardless of income. Must have a legal problem that AppalReD handles.
populations_served: Low-income individuals, vulnerable populations, senior citizens, disaster survivors
cost_information: Free legal services - no fees charged
